participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Jessica is friendly and optimistic. She enjoys sports and has a passion for running. She often expresses her thoughts on friendship and values connection with others.
participant_1.background: I live in canada , near ontario. I run marathons twice a year , mostly in america. My favorite sport is basketball. My favorite basketball team is the vancouver grizzlies. I am an avid runner.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Mark is ambitious and somewhat opinionated, especially regarding financial matters. He enjoys dining out and appreciates the finer things in life, often prioritizing social activities.
participant_2.background: I believe the rich should not be taxed as much. I eat out more than three times a week. I look down on people who did not. I work in finance. I went to an elite ivy league school.

content.text: Hi, I'm from Canada!
Hello! I'm from the US.
Oh, cool! Where are you from?
I'm from New York City.
Nice! I've always wanted to visit New York City.
It's a great city! What do you do for fun?
I like to run marathons and watch basketball.
Oh, that's cool! I like to eat out and go to the movies.
I used to love going to the movies, but I don't have the time anymore.
I know what you mean. I have to go to the movies with friends or family because I don't like going alone.
I used to go to the movies with my friends, but they all moved away.
I'm sorry to hear that. I'm sure you'll make new friends soon.
Thanks! I hope so.
So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a teacher.
Oh, that's cool! I work in finance.
I've always thought about working in finance.
It's a lot of work, but it can be very rewarding.
I'm sure it is.
So, what's your favorite basketball team?
I'm a fan of the Vancouver Grizzlies.
Oh, cool! I'm not a big basketball fan, but I've heard of them.
They're not very good, but I like them anyway.
That's okay. I like some teams that aren't very good either.
I'm glad I'm not the only one.
